title: Harukanaru Toki no Naka de 3: Owarinaki Unmei
original_name: 遙かなる時空の中で 3 終わりなき運命
opening_song: "Kirameki no Tsuki (煌めきの月)" By Naozumi Takahashi and Kazuhiko Inoue
ending_song: "Yuukyuu no Gekkou (悠久の月光)" by Miki Shin'ichiro and Tomokazu Seki
sinopse: The war between the Heike clan and the Genji clan continues. This time, Nozomi has to fight a powerful supernatural enemy and make a choice: protect her friends and stay by Kurou's side, or choose her first love, Masaomi, which is the leader of the Heike, and her enemy.
